𒀀𒈠𒌅 a-ma-tu matter, word

𒈠𒆷𒇻 ma-la-lu
𒈠𒆷𒇻 wooden mortar ?

𓌃 𓂧 𓏏 "mouth" speak => speech, word

𓌃 #mdt MOT ⇔ 𓍛 mace'l, mark, meissel 𓍊𓍐 𓌇𓌈𓌉𓌌≠𓍑 pheme
𓌃 𓂧 𓏏 𓏜 MATTER
𓌃 𓂧 𓏏 𓏜 | matter, affair |
𓌃 𓂧 𓏏 𓈓 | 𐌼𐌰𐌸𐌻𐌴𐌹𐌽 “speech,discourse” | moutheln mauscheln masln ⇔ quasseln
𓌃 𓂧 𓏏 𓏥 | speak, address (someone), speech, word, plea |
𓌃 mot < memnote 𒈨𒈪𒅀𒀸 memiyaš mnemotic memnon memory
𓌃 mot < Mast : מוֹט הַדֶגֶל mot hadegel = Fahnen-Mast 𓌢
𓌃 𓏤 𓆱 mace (staff, rod)
𓌃 MWDT word mutter, utter, writer, वाद vāda, “speech”. …
𓌃 Mut vs Cut כָּתַב katáv كَاتَبَ kātaba

𓌃 𒄷𒄭𒌅 mut-tu Mast®
𓌃 𒄷𒄭𒌅 mut-tu “a pole ” Marterpfahl?
𓌃 𒈬𒁺𒇻 mu-du-lu “a pole” ⇔ ma.tall?

𒊭𒋫𒊒 ša-ṭa-ru | write | šaʳ-ṭa-ru scriter scrit 𓋴 𓐍 𓂋 𓏏 𓍼 𓏤 < script 𓊃 𓈙 𓏞 𓏝
𒊭𒋫𒊒 ša-ṭa-ru | write | •çi-tab-ir ( 𒋫 Tapir 𓏏 𓊪 𓇋 𓅱 𓃒 ) 𐎋𐎚𐎁 ktb כָּתַב katáv ⇔ cut
𒊭𒋫𒊒 ša-ṭa-ru | write | •çi-tab-ir staber 𓌃 𓏤 𓆱 > staff 𓌃 𓂧 𓏏 𓏥 Stab ⇔ buchstabier
⇔
𒈬𒊓𒊒 mu-sa-ru ma.scrit
𒈬𒊓𒊒 mu-sa-ru •ma-ka-ru mark
𒈬𒊓𒊒 mu-sa-ru •ma-ka-ru մակագրություն makagrutʿyun “inscription”
𒈬𒊓𒊒 muⁿsa-ru ⇔ mention memorial
𒈬𒊓𒊒 mu-sa-ru ⇔ measure mark
𒈬𒊓𒊒 inscription

mana- (to pronounce) "Mund" "mouth" ⇔ manner mention

𓌃 BRD > pisaś > söz 쓰다 (ko) (sseuda) សរសេរ (km) (sɑsee) жазу (kk) (jazw) vs c-c 書く かく kaku
